LITER A TURE 3 29

Eggs of Arbacia and Other Animals. Arch. Entw., VIII. 3. 1898.

mik. Anat., XLIX. 1897.

XXVI. 1886.

plasme) : Journ. Anat. et Phys., XXIV.-V. 1898-99. (Full Literature-lists.)

De Vries, H. — Intracellulare Pangenesis: Jena., 18S9. 

Watase, S. — Homology of the Centrosome : Joiirn. Morph., VIII. 2. 1893. 
 Id. — On the Nature of Cell-organization : Woods Holl Biol. Lectures. 1893.

Wien, 1892.
